EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us: Customer Spotlight Webinar with Aridhia
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare> Join us <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare> for our next webinar – Enabling Personalized Healthcare with Biomedical Informatics – on Wednesday, August 27, 2014 at 8AM PDT/4PM GMT+1.
Pivotal will be joined by our customer, Aridhia, a world leading health informatics company developing technology that supports the innovation, collaboration and management of chronic diseases, stratified medicine and biomedical research through the use of biomedical informatics and analytics.
Register <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare> now to learn how Aridhia is:
- Maximizing the use of existing available data within the healthcare system. - Enablling healthcare providers to assess clinical outcomes based on near real-time local data. - Delivering care locally through sharing of information between healthcare providers and organizations. - Reducing the risks associated with handover of care between different healthcare provider groups. - Providing patients with information, enabling them to make informed choices about their care.
We look forward to you joining us. The Pivotal Team CUSTOMER SPOTLIGHT WEBINAR WEDNESDAY AUGUST 27, 2014 8:00AM PDT 4:00PM GMT+1 REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/hadoop/customer-case-study/pivotal-hadoop-and-aridhia-revolutionize-healthcare>
